text: A Colt Double Action (or Colt D. A. for short) is any of the double-action revolvers manufactured by the Colt's Manufacturing Company. The term is most commonly used for the historical 1877 and 1878 models, but it also may refer to the following firearms: * Colt M1877 * Colt M1878 * Colt M1892 * Colt New Service * Colt Cobra * Colt Trooper * Colt Python * Colt Anaconda * Colt King Cobra
title: Colt Double Action
